sqlMap.select:
SELECT TT.VEHICLE_VIN,TT.VEHICLE_LN,TT.CELLPHONE,TT.VEH_EXT_INFO,TT.STAT_INFO,TT.TERMINAL_TIME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.VEHICLE_VIN,B.VEHICLE_LN,S.CELLPHONE,T.VEH_EXT_INFO,T.STAT_INFO,T.TERMINAL_TIME FROM CLW_JC_TERMINAL_T T,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B,CLW_CL_SIM_T S WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID IN (SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#)
) AND B.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND B.FEE_FLAG = '0' AND S.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND T.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T.SIM_CARD_NUMBER = S.SIM_CARD_NUMBER(+)) TT
TT.VEHICLE_VIN like '%'||#VEHICLE_VIN#||'%' escape '\'
TT.VEHICLE_LN like '%'||#VEHICLE_LN#||'%' escape '\'
TT.CELLPHONE like '%'||#CELLPHONE#||'%' escape '\'
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT TT.VEHICLE_VIN,TT.VEHICLE_LN,TT.CELLPHONE,TT.VEH_EXT_INFO,TT.STAT_INFO,TT.TERMINAL_TIME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.VEHICLE_VIN,B.VEHICLE_LN,S.CELLPHONE,T.VEH_EXT_INFO,T.STAT_INFO,T.TERMINAL_TIME FROM CLW_JC_TERMINAL_T T,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B,CLW_CL_SIM_T S WHERE B.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND B.FEE_FLAG = '0' AND S.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND T.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T.SIM_CARD_NUMBER = S.SIM_CARD_NUMBER(+)) TT WHERE TT.VEHICLE_VIN in ($VEHICLE_VINS$)
$sortname$ $sortorder$

SELECT TT.VEHICLE_VIN,TT.VEHICLE_LN,TT.CELLPHONE,TT.VEH_EXT_INFO,TT.STAT_INFO,TT.TERMINAL_TIME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.VEHICLE_VIN,B.VEHICLE_LN,S.CELLPHONE,T.VEH_EXT_INFO,T.STAT_INFO,T.TERMINAL_TIME FROM CLW_JC_TERMINAL_T T,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B,CLW_CL_SIM_T S WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID IN (SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#)
) AND B.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND B.FEE_FLAG = '0' AND S.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND T.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T.SIM_CARD_NUMBER = S.SIM_CARD_NUMBER(+)) TT
TT.VEHICLE_VIN like '%'||#VEHICLE_VIN#||'%' escape '\'
TT.VEHICLE_LN like '%'||#VEHICLE_LN#||'%' escape '\'
TT.CELLPHONE like '%'||#CELLPHONE#||'%' escape '\'
$sortname$ $sortorder$
select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE USER_ID=#USER_ID# ORDER BY VEHICLE_VIN DESC

select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SPEEDING, DIRECTION, TERMINAL_TIME, VEHICLE_COLOR, LIMITE_NUMBER, OIL_INSTANT, ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, DRIVER_ID, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, INOUT_FLAG, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STAT_INFO, SITE_ID, STU_NUM, SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING, GPS_SPEEDING FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE VEHICLE_VIN in ($VEHICLE_VINS$) and TERMINAL_TIME is not null

select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SPEEDING, DIRECTION, TERMINAL_TIME, VEHICLE_COLOR, LIMITE_NUMBER, OIL_INSTANT, ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, DRIVER_ID, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, INOUT_FLAG, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STAT_INFO, SITE_ID, STU_NUM, SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING, GPS_SPEEDING FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE VEHICLE_VIN = #VEHICLE_VIN# and TERMINAL_TIME is not null

select T.VEHICLE_VIN, T.VEHICLE_LN, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SPEEDING, DIRECTION, TERMINAL_TIME, OIL_INSTANT, ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, STAT_INFO, R.ROUTE_ID ROUTE_ID, T.VEHICLE_COLOR, STU_NUM, T.LIMITE_NUMBER, T.DRIVER_ID, E.SHORT_NAME ENTER_SHORT_NAME, S.DRIVER_NAME DRIVER_NAME, S.DRIVER_TEL DRIVER_TEL, R.ROUTE_NAME ROUTE_NAME, T.MILEAGE, T.POWER_STATE, C.SICHEN_ID, C.SICHEN_NAME, C.SICHEN_TEL, T.VEH_EXT_INFO, T.GPS_SPEEDING, T.SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING
FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI T,CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_T E,CLW_YW_DRIVER_T S,CLW_XC_ROUTE_T R ,CLW_XC_SICHEN_T C,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B WHERE T.DRIVER_ID=to_char(S.DRIVER_ID(+)) AND T.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN AND T.ROUTE_ID=R.ROUTE_ID(+) AND E.ENTERPRISE_ID=B.ORGANIZATION_ID AND T.CURRENT_TEACHER=to_char(C.SICHEN_ID(+)) AND T.VEHICLE_VIN =#VEHICLE_VIN#

select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SPEEDING, DIRECTION, TERMINAL_TIME, VEHICLE_COLOR, LIMITE_NUMBER, OIL_INSTANT, ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, DRIVER_ID, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, INOUT_FLAG, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STAT_INFO, SITE_ID, STU_NUM, MILEAGE, SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING, GPS_SPEEDING FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE VEHICLE_VIN = #VEHICLE_VIN# and TERMINAL_TIME is not null

select test.VEHICLE_VIN, test.latitude, test.longitude, test.speeding, test.direction, test.oil_instant, test.engine_rotate_speed, test.terminal_time, test.STAT_INFO, test.STU_NUM, test.ALARM_BASE_INFO, b.LIMITE_NUMBER, S.DRIVER_NAME from (SELECT DISTINCT t.VEHICLE_VIN, t.latitude, t.longitude, case when T.SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING = '1' then T.GPS_SPEEDING else T.SPEEDING end speeding , t.direction, t.oil_instant, t.engine_rotate_speed, t.terminal_time, t.STAT_INFO, t.STU_NUM , t.DRIVER_ID, t.ALARM_BASE_INFO FROM clw_yw_terminal_record_t t where t.TERMINAL_TIME is not null and t.VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN# and t.TERMINAL_TIME >= to_date(#STARTTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.TERMINAL_TIME <= to_date(#ENDTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) test , (select B.LIMITE_NUMBER,B.VEHICLE_VIN from CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B where B.VEHICLE_VIN =#VEHICLE_VIN# ) b, CLW_YW_DRIVER_T S
where test.DRIVER_ID=to_char(S.DRIVER_ID(+)) and test.VEHICLE_VIN = b.VEHICLE_VIN order by test.TERMINAL_TIME

select * from (select VEHICLE_VIN, latitude, longitude, speeding, direction, oil_instant, engine_rotate_speed, terminal_time, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, STAT_INFO, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STU_NUM, S.DRIVER_NAME DRIVER_NAME, b.LIMITE_NUMBER a.ALARM_TYPE_ID, y.ALARM_TYPE_NAME FROM clw_yw_terminal_record_t partition($ARRATABNAME$) t,CLW_YW_DRIVER_T S,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T b, CLW_YW_ALERM_RECORD_T a,CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T y
WHERE t.ID = a.RECORD_ID (+) and a.ALARM_TYPE_ID = y.ALARM_TYPE_ID(+) and t.TERMINAL_TIME > to_date(#STARTTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.TERMINAL_TIME < to_date(#ENDTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TERMINAL_TIME is not null and t.DRIVER_ID=to_char(S.DRIVER_ID(+)) and t.VEHICLE_VIN = b.VEHICLE_VIN(+) and VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN#
union
select VEHICLE_VIN, latitude, longitude, speeding, direction, oil_instant, engine_rotate_speed, terminal_time, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, STAT_INFO, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STU_NUM, S.DRIVER_NAME DRIVER_NAME, b.LIMITE_NUMBER a.ALARM_TYPE_ID , y.ALARM_TYPE_NAME FROM clw_yw_terminal_record_t partition($ARRATABNAME$) t,CLW_YW_DRIVER_T S,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T b, CLW_YW_ALERM_RECORD_T a,CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T y
WHERE t.ID = a.RECORD_ID (+) and a.ALARM_TYPE_ID = y.ALARM_TYPE_ID(+) and t.TERMINAL_TIME > to_date(#STARTTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.TERMINAL_TIME < to_date(#ENDTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and TERMINAL_TIME is not null and t.DRIVER_ID=to_char(S.DRIVER_ID(+)) and t.VEHICLE_VIN = b.VEHICLE_VIN(+) and VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN#
) t order by t.TERMINAL_TIME

SELECT ROUTE_ID, ROUTE_NAME FROM CLW_XC_ROUTE_T t WHERE ROUTE_ORGANIZATION_ID in (select enterprise_id from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where left_num >= (select left_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #route_enterprise_id#) and right_num <=(select right_num from clw_jc_enterprise_vi where enterprise_id = #route_enterprise_id#)
) AND VALID_FLAG='0'

select * from ( select user_name,operate_time,deal_state,remark from (select
d.user_name user_name, to_char(a.operate_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') operate_time, a.deal_state, a.remark remark from CLW_YW_SEND_COMMAND_T A,CLW_JC_USER_T D where a.operate_user_id = d.user_id and a.send_type = '2002' and A.vehicle_vin=#VEHICLE_VIN# and A.OPERATE_TIME between to_date(#line_start_time#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#line_end_time#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ORDER BY operate_time DESC ) )

select s.SITE_ID, s.SITE_NAME, s.SICHEN_ADDR, s.SITE_LONGITUDE, s.SITE_LATITUDE, s.SITE_REMARK, s.ENTERPRISE_ID, s.ORGANIZATION_ID, s.CREATER, s.CREATE_TIME, s.VALID_FLAG, r.RS_ORDER, r.SITE_UPDOWN from CLW_XC_ROUTESITE_T r,CLW_XC_SITE_T s where s.SITE_ID = r.SITE_ID and s.VALID_FLAG = '0' and r.ROUTE_ID = #ROUTE_ID#

SELECT T.PHOTO_ID, TO_CHAR(T.PHOTO_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PHOTO_TIME, T.CHANNEL_NUMBER, T.PHOTO_FILE, T.PHOTO_EVENT, T.PHOTO_FALG, T.PHOTO_DESC, JU_F.USER_NAME AS F_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.FLAG_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FLAG_TIME, JU_R.USER_NAME AS R_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.RELI_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RELI_TIME FROM CLW_YW_PHOTO_T T, CLW_JC_USER_T JU_F, CLW_JC_USER_T JU_R WHERE VEHICLE_VIN = #VEHICLE_VIN# AND T.FLAG_USER = JU_F.USER_ID(+) AND T.RELI_USER = JU_R.USER_ID(+) ORDER BY PHOTO_TIME DESC
sqlMap.update:
update CLW_YW_PHOTO_T set
PHOTO_FALG = #PHOTO_FALG#, FLAG_USER = #FLAG_USER#, FLAG_TIME = sysdate,
PHOTO_FALG = #PHOTO_FALG#, RELI_USER = #FLAG_USER#, RELI_TIME = sysdate,
PHOTO_DESC = #PHOTO_DESC# where PHOTO_ID = #PHOTO_ID#
sqlMap.select: select t.VEHICLE_VIN, t.VEHICLE_LN, t.LATITUDE, t.LONGITUDE, t.SPEEDING, t.DIRECTION, t.TERMINAL_TIME, t.VEHICLE_COLOR, t.LIMITE_NUMBER, t.OIL_INSTANT, t.ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, t.DRIVER_ID, t.ALARM_BASE_INFO, t.ALARM_EXT_INFO, t.INOUT_FLAG, t.OVERLOAD_FLAG, t.STAT_INFO, t.SITE_ID, t.STU_NUM, c.STU_ID, c.SITE_ID CHILD_SITE_ID, c.SITE_FLAG, c.VSS_FLAG, c.ALARM_ID, c.ST_DOWM_NUM, c.ST_UP_NUM, c.ST_NUM, c.LATITUDE ST_LATITUDE, c.LONGITUDE ST_LONGITUDE, s.STU_NAME from CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_T c,CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI t,CLW_XC_STUDENT_T s where c.VEHICLE_VIN=t.VEHICLE_VIN and c.STU_ID=s.STU_ID and c.STU_ID in (select p.STU_ID from CLW_XC_ST_PR_T p where p.PR_USERID=#USER_ID# )

SELECT T.VEHICLE_VIN, T.VEHICLE_LN, T.LATITUDE, T.LONGITUDE, T.VEHICLE_COLOR, T.TERMINAL_TIME, T.STAT_INFO, T.STU_NUM, T.LIMITE_NUMBER, T.DRIVER_ID, S.DRIVER_NAME DRIVER_NAME, R.ROUTE_ID ROUTE_ID, R.ROUTE_NAME ROUTE_NAME, C.STU_ID, C.SITE_ID CHILD_SITE_ID, C.SITE_FLAG, C.VSS_FLAG, C.ALARM_ID, C.ST_DOWM_NUM, C.ST_UP_NUM, C.ST_NUM, C.UP_SITE_ID, C.DOWN_SITE_ID, C.UP_SITE_TIME, C.DOWN_SITE_TIME, SS.STU_NAME, SS.STU_CARD_ID, SS.STU_SCHOOL, SS.STU_CLASS
FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI T,CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_T C,CLW_XC_STUDENT_T SS,CLW_YW_DRIVER_T S,CLW_XC_ROUTE_T R WHERE T.DRIVER_ID=TO_CHAR(S.DRIVER_ID(+)) AND T.ROUTE_ID=R.ROUTE_ID(+) AND C.VEHICLE_VIN=T.VEHICLE_VIN AND C.STU_ID=SS.STU_ID AND T.VEHICLE_VIN =#VEHICLE_VIN# AND C.STU_ID =#STU_ID#

select * from CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T t where to_char(t.TERMINAL_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') > #STARTTIME# and to_char(t.TERMINAL_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') < #ENDTIME# and t.VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN# and t.STU_ID=#STU_ID#

select count(1) FROM CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T xscr, clw_jc_clen_vi ccbi,clw_xc_student_t stu where xscr.vehicle_vin = ccbi.vehicle_vin and xscr.stu_id=stu.stu_id and stu.valid_flag='0' and xscr.OPERATE_FLAG = '0' and xscr.alarm_type_id in (73,74,79,80) and xscr.STU_ID in ( select t.STU_ID from CLW_XC_ST_PR_T t where t.PR_USERID = #PR_USERID# )

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T T1, CLW_XC_STUDENT_T T2, (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN,A.VEHICLE_LN FROM CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND A.DEVICE_TYPE = '0') T3 WHERE T1.STU_ID = T2.STU_ID AND T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T3.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T2.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T1.VSS_FLAG != '2' AND T1.STU_ID IN (SELECT TT.STU_ID FROM CLW_XC_ST_PR_T TT WHERE TT.PR_USERID=#USERID#)
T1.VSS_FLAG = #VSS_FLAG#
T1.SITE_FLAG=#SITE_FLAG#
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')

SELECT T1.ID, T1.STU_ID, T2.STU_NAME, T2.STU_CODE, T2.STU_SCHOOL, T2.STU_CLASS, T3.VEHICLE_LN, T4.ROUTE_NAME, T5.SICHEN_NAME, T6.DRIVER_NAME, T1.MESG_FLAG, T1.SITE_FLAG||T1.VSS_FLAG ST_RIDE_FLAG, TO_CHAR(T1.TERMINAL_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') TERMINAL_TIME, T1.SITE_ID, T7.SITE_NAME FROM CLW_XC_ST_CHECK_RECORD_T T1,CLW_XC_STUDENT_T T2, (SELECT A.VEHICLE_VIN,A.VEHICLE_LN FROM CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0'AND A.DEVICE_TYPE = '0') T3, (SELECT A.ROUTE_ID,A.ROUTE_NAME FROM CLW_XC_ROUTE_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T4, (SELECT A.SICHEN_ID,A.SICHEN_NAME FROM CLW_XC_SICHEN_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T5, (SELECT A.DRIVER_ID,A.DRIVER_NAME FROM CLW_YW_DRIVER_T A WHERE A.VALID_FLAG = '0') T6, CLW_XC_SITE_T T7 WHERE T1.STU_ID = T2.STU_ID AND T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T3.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T1.ROUTE_ID = T4.ROUTE_ID(+) AND T1.SICHEN_ID = T5.SICHEN_ID(+) AND T1.DRIVER_ID = T6.DRIVER_ID(+) AND T1.SITE_ID = T7.SITE_ID(+) AND T2.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T1.VSS_FLAG != '2' AND T1.STU_ID IN (SELECT TT.STU_ID FROM CLW_XC_ST_PR_T TT WHERE TT.PR_USERID=#USERID#)
T1.VSS_FLAG = #VSS_FLAG#
T1.SITE_FLAG=#SITE_FLAG#
T1.TERMINAL_TIME >= TO_DATE(#begTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
T1.TERMINAL_TIME <= TO_DATE(#endTime#,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss')
$sortname$ $sortorder$
select VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN FROM CLW_JC_CL_TERMINAL_NEWVI WHERE VEHICLE_VIN in ('$VEHICLE_VINS$')

select t.INFO_ID, t.INFO_TITLE, t.INFO_REMARK, t.ENTERPRIST_ID, t.CREATE_USER, to_char(t.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_TIME from CLW_XC_ENTERPRIST_INFO_T t where t.ENTERPRIST_ID='default' or t.ENTERPRIST_ID = #ENTERPRIST_ID# order by t.CREATE_TIME desc
select t.INFO_ID, t.INFO_TITLE, t.INFO_REMARK, t.ENTERPRIST_ID, t.CREATE_USER, to_char(t.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_TIME from CLW_XC_ENTERPRIST_INFO_T t where t.INFO_ID=#INFO_ID#
select count(*) from CLW_XC_ENTERPRIST_INFO_T t where t.INFO_TITLE=#INFO_TITLE# and t.ENTERPRIST_ID =#ENTERPRIST_ID#

SELECT T1.ID, T1.VEHICLE_VIN, T2.VEHICLE_LN, TO_CHAR(T1.ON_DATE,'HH24:mi:ss') ON_DATE, TO_CHAR(T1.OFF_DATE,'HH24:mi:ss') OFF_DATE, NVL(DECODE(T1.SPD_OIL,'FFFF','--',T1.SPD_OIL),'--') SPD_OIL, NVL(DECODE(T1.OIL,'FFFF','--',T1.OIL),'--') OIL, NVL(DECODE(T1.MILEAGE,'FFFF','--',T1.MILEAGE),'--') MILEAGE, T3.ROUTE_IDS, case when T1.MILEAGE >0 then 1 else 0 end HAVEMILEAGE FROM CLW_XC_RUN_RECORD_T T1, CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T T2, ( SELECT T.VEHICLE_VIN,WMSYS.WM_CONCAT(T.ROUTE_ID) AS ROUTE_IDS FROM CLW_XC_TRIP_T T WHERE T.VALID_FLAG='0' GROUP BY T.VEHICLE_VIN ) T3 WHERE T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T2.VEHICLE_VIN AND T1.VEHICLE_VIN = T3.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T2.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T2.DEVICE_TYPE = '0'
T2.ORGANIZATION_ID IN
(SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID =#ENTERPRISE_ID#) )
T1.VEHICLE_VIN = #VEHICLE_VIN#
T1.ON_DATE >= TO_DATE(#START_TIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
T1.ON_DATE <= TO_DATE(#END_TIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
ORDER BY HAVEMILEAGE DESC, ON_DATE DESC

SELECT TT.VEHICLE_VIN,TT.VEHICLE_LN,TT.CELLPHONE,TT.VEH_EXT_INFO,TT.STAT_INFO,TT.TERMINAL_TIME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.VEHICLE_VIN,B.VEHICLE_LN,S.CELLPHONE,T.VEH_EXT_INFO,T.STAT_INFO,T.TERMINAL_TIME FROM CLW_JC_TERMINAL_T T,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B,CLW_CL_SIM_T S WHERE ORGANIZATION_ID IN ( SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID as id FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_T WHERE VALID_FLAG='0' AND ENTERPRISE_ID IN ( SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #ENTERPRISE_ID#) AND RIGHT_NUM <=(SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID =#ENTERPRISE_ID#) ) START WITH SHORT_NAME like '%$ENTER_SHORT_NAME$%' escape '\' CONNECT BY PARENT_ID=PRIOR ENTERPRISE_ID ) AND B.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND B.FEE_FLAG = '0' AND S.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND T.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND T.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND T.SIM_CARD_NUMBER = S.SIM_CARD_NUMBER(+)) TT
$sortname$ $sortorder$
select t.ALARM_TYPE_NAME from CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T t where t.ALARM_TYPE_ID = #ALARM_TYPE_ID#

SELECT TO_CHAR(I.TERMINAL_TIME,'HH24:MI:SS') TERMINAL_TIME, I.VEHICLE_VIN, I.SITE_ID, I.SITE_NAME, I.ROUTE_ID, I.ROUTE_NAME, I.INOUT_FLAG, I.SITE_UPDOWN, I.TRIP_ID FROM CLW_XC_INOUTSITE_T PARTITION($partition$) I WHERE I.VEHICLE_VIN=#vehicle_vin# AND I.INOUT_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY I.TERMINAL_TIME

SELECT I.SITE_ID, I.SITE_NAME, I.SITE_LATITUDE, I.SITE_LONGITUDE FROM CLW_XC_INOUTSITE_T PARTITION($partition$) I WHERE I.VEHICLE_VIN=#vehicle_vin# AND I.INOUT_FLAG = '0' AND I.TRIP_ID = #trip_id# AND I.TERMINAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#start_time#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#end_time#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY I.TERMINAL_TIME

SELECT TT.VEHICLE_VIN, TT.speeding, TT.direction, TT.oil_instant, TT.engine_rotate_speed, TT.STAT_INFO, TT.STU_NUM, TT.LIMITE_NUMBER, AA.ALARM_TYPE_ID, AA.LATITUDE, AA.LONGITUDE, AA.ALARM_TYPE_NAME, AA.ALARM_TIME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.ID, t.VEHICLE_VIN, case when T.SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING = '1' then T.GPS_SPEEDING else T.SPEEDING end speeding , t.direction, t.oil_instant, t.engine_rotate_speed, t.terminal_time, t.STAT_INFO, t.STU_NUM, B.LIMITE_NUMBER FROM clw_yw_terminal_record_t partition($ARRATABNAME$) t ,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B
where t.TERMINAL_TIME is not null and t.VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN# and t.TERMINAL_TIME >= to_date(#STARTTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.TERMINAL_TIME <= to_date(#ENDTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.VEHICLE_VIN=B.VEHICLE_VIN) TT, (select /*+ INDEX(A CLW_YW_ALERM_RECORD_VE_U_IDX)*/ A.RECORD_ID, A.ALARM_TYPE_ID, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, Y.ALARM_TYPE_NAME, A.ALARM_TIME from CLW_YW_ALERM_RECORD_T A,CLW_CL_ALARMTYPE_T y where A.VEHICLE_VIN=#VEHICLE_VIN# and A.ALARM_TIME >= to_date(#STARTTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and A.ALARM_TIME <= to_date(#ENDTIME#,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and A.ALARM_TYPE_ID = Y.ALARM_TYPE_ID) AA WHERE TT.ID=AA.RECORD_ID

SELECT I.VEHICLE_VIN, I.DRIVER_ID, I.ROUTE_NAME, I.ROUTE_ID, B.VEHICLE_LN, D.DRIVER_NAME, I.TRIP_ID FROM CLW_XC_INOUTSITE_T I,CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T B,CLW_YW_DRIVER_T D WHERE I.VEHICLE_VIN=#vehicle_vin# AND I.INOUT_FLAG = '0' AND I.TRIP_ID = #trip_id# AND I.TERMINAL_TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#start_time#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#end_time#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND I.VEHICLE_VIN = B.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND I.DRIVER_ID = D.DRIVER_ID(+) ORDER BY I.TERMINAL_TIME

select JT.VEHICLE_VIN, VEHICLE_LN, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, SPEEDING, DIRECTION, TERMINAL_TIME, VEHICLE_COLOR, LIMITE_NUMBER, OIL_INSTANT, ENGINE_ROTATE_SPEED, JT.DRIVER_ID, ALARM_BASE_INFO, ALARM_EXT_INFO, INOUT_FLAG, OVERLOAD_FLAG, STAT_INFO, SITE_ID, STU_NUM, SPEED_SOURCE_SETTING, GPS_SPEEDING FROM CLW_JC_TERMINAL_T JT, CLW_CL_BASE_INFO_T CBI, CLW_CL_SIM_T CS, CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_T JE WHERE JT.VEHICLE_VIN = CBI.VEHICLE_VIN(+) AND JT.SIM_CARD_NUMBER = CS.SIM_CARD_NUMBER(+) AND CBI.ENTERPRISE_ID = JE.ENTERPRISE_ID(+) AND JT.TERMINAL_ID IS NOT NULL AND JT.VEHICLE_VIN IS NOT NULL AND JT.SIM_CARD_NUMBER IS NOT NULL AND JT.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND CBI.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND CS.VALID_FLAG = '0' AND JT.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND CBI.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND CS.DEVICE_TYPE = '0' AND JT.Latitude is not null AND JT.LONGITUDE is not null AND JT.LATITUDE !='FFFF' AND JT.LONGITUDE !='FFFF' AND CBI.ORGANIZATION_ID IS NOT NULL
AND CBI.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (SELECT ENTERPRISE_ID FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE LEFT_NUM >= (SELECT LEFT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #organization_id#) AND RIGHT_NUM <= (SELECT RIGHT_NUM FROM CLW_JC_ENTERPRISE_VI WHERE ENTERPRISE_ID = #organization_id#))
and CBI.VEHICLE_VIN in ($VEHICLE_VINS$)
and ( (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '0' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 30 * 60) or (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '1' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 5 * 60) )
and ( (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '0' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 >= 30 * 60) or (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '1' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 >= 5 * 60) )
and ( (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '0' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 30 * 60) or (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '1' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 5 * 60) ) and NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '1' AND JT.FIRE_UP_STATE='1'
and ( (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '0' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 30 * 60) or (NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '1' and (SYSDATE - JT.TERMINAL_TIME) * 24 * 60 * 60 < 5 * 60) ) and NVL(SUBSTRB(JT.STAT_INFO, 32, 1), '1') = '0' AND JT.FIRE_UP_STATE='0'
and JT.VEHICLE_VIN IN ( SELECT T1.VEHICLE_VIN FROM CLW_YW_ALERM_RECORD_T T1 WHERE T1.ALARM_TYPE_ID in('40','32') AND T1.DEAL_FLAG='0' AND T1.ALARM_TIME >= trunc(sysdate,'mm') )
